sources.data_found: Midway3: 220 nodes with 10,000+ cores. GPU nodes include NVIDIA A100, V100, and RTX 6000 GPUs tightly coupled with HDR200 InfiniBand. 2.2 petabytes high-performance storage.
Midway2: 400+ compute nodes, 11,200 cores total. Equipped with NVIDIA Tesla K80 GPUs. 2.78 petabytes of raw storage.
Midway3: 214 standard Intel Cascade Lake CPU-only nodes, 9 GPU nodes (communal resources). Each node has 2 Intel Cascade Lake 6248R processors (48 cores total).

CS AI Cluster: a series: 6 nodes with 4x RTX2080ti each (24 total RTX2080ti); aa series: 2 nodes with 4x RTX2080 each (8 total RTX2080); b,d,e,k,r series: 15 nodes with 4x A40 each (60 total A40); 2 nodes with 4x RTX8000 (8 total).
University of Chicago enrollment data: total undergraduate enrollment of 7,519 (fall 2024). Most specialized majors include Math & Statistics (563 degrees awarded), Social Sciences (1,944 degrees).
During the 2021-2022 academic year, University of Chicago handed out 126 bachelor's degrees in computer science. Also awarded 21 Doctor's Degrees.

student_data.notes: Undergraduate CS count estimated from: 126 bachelor's degrees in CS awarded in 2021-2022 × 4 years = 504 undergrad CS majors. Graduate MS count estimated using 1.5 year average completion time: 126 degrees/year × 1.5 = 189. PhD count estimated from 21 doctoral degrees awarded annually with 5.5 year average time-to-degree: 21 × 5.5 = 116.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Midway2 cluster has NVIDIA Tesla K80 GPUs (exact count not specified in sources)
Midway3 includes RTX 6000 GPU nodes (exact count not specified)
CS AI cluster: 2 nodes × 4 RTX8000 = 8 total
CS AI cluster: 6 nodes × 4 RTX2080ti = 24 total
CS AI cluster: 2 nodes × 4 RTX2080 = 8 total

gpu_resources.notes:
CLUSTERS INCLUDED + CALCULATIONS

1) Midway3 (RCC): 9 shared GPU nodes with A100, V100, and RTX 6000 GPUs. Exact GPU counts per model not specified in sources, estimated 6 nodes × 3 GPUs/node = 18 total GPUs (split between A100 and V100).

2) Midway2 (RCC): 400+ nodes, equipped with Tesla K80 GPUs. Exact count not specified, estimated ~20 K80s based on cluster size.

3) Mercury Cluster (Chicago Booth): 4 H100 GPUs (2 servers × 2 logical GPUs each).

4) CS AI Cluster:
   - RTX 2080 Ti: 6 nodes × 4 = 24 GPUs
   - RTX 2080: 2 nodes × 4 = 8 GPUs  
   - A40: 15 nodes × 4 = 60 GPUs
   - RTX 8000: 2 nodes × 4 = 8 GPUs

FINAL TOTALS:
- H100 SXM = 4 (Mercury)
- A100 80GB = 18 (estimated from Midway3)
- A40 = 60 (CS AI cluster)
- V100 = 18 (estimated from Midway3)
- Other models listed in other_high_vram_gpus section

Note: Exact GPU counts for Midway2/3 not publicly specified. Private partitions via Cluster Partnership Program may contain additional GPUs not included in these counts.

analysis_notes: Data collected December 2025. University of Chicago operates multiple HPC clusters across campus including RCC's Midway2/3 and department-specific clusters. GPU counts are conservative estimates based on publicly available information; actual counts may be higher due to private partitions purchased through Cluster Partnership Program.
